meta.description: Determine the number of escalators and elevators to install to minimize space while meeting transport and ratio requirements.

sets.name: TRANSPORT_TYPES
sets.description: Types of transport installations available at the airport.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each transport type in people per minute.

params.name: space
params.description: Space taken by each transport type in units.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each transport type to install.

objective.name: min_total_space
objective.expr: sum(space[t] * x[t] for t in TRANSPORT_TYPES)
objective.description: Minimize the total space taken by the installed transport types.

constraints.name: capacity_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure the total transport capacity is at least 400 people per minute.

constraints.name: escalator_to_elevator_ratio
constraints.description: Ensure there are at least three times more escalators than elevators.

constraints.name: minimum_elevators
constraints.description: Ensure at least 2 elevators are installed.
